item.title: Redis Eviction Deep Dive: LRU vs LFU vs TTL Engineering Trade-offs
item.description: Textbook LRU uses a doubly-linked list + HashMap. But why does Redis use “approximate LRU”? This post dives into Redis source code to analyze the engineering trade-offs behind different eviction strategies.
